channel.title: Making forums for people
channel.description:
[center]I will make forums for people all i want is to be mod on your server and i will want to be mod on the forums thats all to get forums just copy and paste the below and fill it out[/center]
[code][b]Server name:[/b] [b]Server IP[/b]: [b]A link to a website you already have[/b](optional): [b]Colour/theme[/b]: [b]Your name on moparscape forums[/b]: [/code]

item.title: Making forums for people
item.dc:creator: @master_web_coder master_web_coder
item.description:
@master_web_coder wrote:

just think before you post next time you dont have to get rude at me because now your totaly off topic so [back on topic]about the forums the forums are made with SMF exactly the same as these forums so they look really good

Read full topic

item.description:

so think about it what you are about to say before you press the Post button
